main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Beverly, Massachusetts on July 8, 1952, from 2300 to 2330 hours, moving rapidly back and forth along the horizon while changing colors and size.
interesting points: The object was observed through binoculars by a 40-year-old male civilian with a good reputation and career in business., The UFO moved at a high rate of speed and emitted bright lights., Several other individuals in Beverly reported similar sightings during the same timeframe., The object appeared to be disc-shaped with a flat dome on top., No photographs or physical evidence were obtained during the investigation.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object changing colors and size
witness description: a 40-year-old male civilian with a good reputation and career in business
